name: OR_ESU_PRESKIN_CND
description: The OR_ESU_PRESKIN_CND table stores the condition of the skin before the placement of the ESU grounding pad.

columns.name: LINE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: GRND_PAD_PRESKIN_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number for skin conditions before placing the electrosurgical unit (ESU) grounding pad.
